column4: Does anyone know how to set your terminal to have a differant back ground like the windows cmd.exe command prompt>.<?
Huh? the background image is setable by the gnome-terminal profile settings.. the PROMPT is setable by the PS1 variable
i mean to change the color
to make the background black or blue or somthing
gnome-terminal settings has all sorts of settings for the terminal itself
could you elaborate how to get there?
'of terminal' means very little.. thats the whole point of confuseion
ok ty Dr_Willis sorry for the confusion
add a dozen new profiles one for each color of the rainbow if you want.

run gnome-terminal, edit menu -> 'profiles...' or  'profile perferances'
